Name: Zoning, Brooklyn Yards, Brooklyn (C 230191 ZSK)
Title: Application number C 230191 ZSK (Brooklyn Yards) submitted by Brooklyn Yards Development, LLC, pursuant to Sections 197-c and 201 of the New York City Charter for the grant of a special permit pursuant to Section 74-52 of the Zoning Resolution to reduce the number of required accessory off-street parking spaces for dwelling units in a development within a Transit Zone, that includes at least 20 percent of all dwelling units as income-restricted housing units, in connection with a proposed mixed-use development on property located at 1557 60th Street Avenue (Block 5727, p/o Lot 14), in a C4-5 District, Borough of Brooklyn, Community District 11, Council Districts 43 and 44.

History.Description: This Land Use Application was Introduced by Council
This Land Use Application was Referred to Comm by Council to the Subcommittee on Zoning and Franchises
This Land Use Application was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Land Use

Attachments.Name: Calendar of the Subcommittee Meetings - October 7, 2024
